name: Exile's Student
flavor: "We armed ourselves with Light and set out to find the master." —Fractal Scrolls

name: FEVER AND REMEDY~
flavor: Judith-D: ~consumption~ strongly encouraged.

name: Ill Will
flavor: I am a particular genie, for a particular wish.

name: The Lingering Song
flavor: Forged in honor of Skorri, she of sage counsel and joyful song.

name: Free Will III
flavor: Executor-issued hand cannon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: How Dare You
flavor: "You think you're so great…"

name: The Palindrome
flavor: Draw, O coward!

name: The Wail
flavor: A personal firearm, named and sanctified by the Future War Cult's leaders.

name: Fatebringer (Adept)
flavor: But where is your fate, and who brings it to you?

name: ((FEVER AND REMEDY~))
flavor: ~replicate(encourage)~ strongly ~enhance sig(EscherZhang)~

name: Zaouli's Bane (Adept)
flavor: As the teeth rend and tear, my consolation is that the child lives.

name: Word of Crota (Adept)
flavor: Death itself crumbled when he spoke, and what was left was hard and cruel.

name: A Little Voice
flavor: Pardon me, but could I interrupt?

name: Ace of Spades
flavor: Don't play your hand unless you're sure you have that ace in the hole.

name: Appellant III
flavor: Executor-issued hand cannon for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Azurduy-A
flavor: Break the Darkness's hold on your City.

name: Backhanded Compliment
flavor: "You look good in red."

name: Bandit Mk. 24
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. The Bandit is a multirole design with a distinctive burnt-peat smell.

name: Bandit Mk. 36
flavor: A reliable gun in unreliable times, the Bandit Mk.36 allegedly features an onboard manufactory. Buyer beware.

name: Byronic Hero
flavor: Brood, baby, brood.

name: Cordova-HC3
flavor: Old roads. Bright arches. Loud voices. Stay close.

name: Down and Doubt 00-0
flavor: We all have those days.

name: Duke Mk. 10
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. The Mark 10 Duke is a well-balanced example.

name: Duke Mk. 20
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. Some Mark 20 Dukes bear a hand-scratched engraving, I DO NOT STRAY.

name: Duke Mk. 21
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. The Mark 21 Duke is notable for its excellent reliability even when wet.

name: Equuleus
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the little horse of the night sky.

name: Eyasluna
flavor: One day, young hawk, thou shalt sail beneath the silvered moon.

name: Fatebringer
flavor: Delivering the inevitable, one pull at a time.

name: Finnala's Peril
flavor: A personal firearm, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Gaheris-D
flavor: Balanced and dependable, the Häkke Gaheris-D is a true warrior's weapon.

name: Häkke Test-A
flavor: Häkke prototype. Score Crucible kills with this weapon to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

name: Hard Luck Mk. 52
flavor: Marked with spades. Tuned for a fight. Ready to end any uncomfortable disputes.

name: Harrowed Zaouli's Bane
flavor: Go, child! Run! Don't look back! Don't—"

name: Hawkmoon
flavor: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

name: Heaven Can Wait
flavor: There's still work for us in Hell.

name: Her Mercy
flavor: This hand cannon was commissioned for those Wolves who pledged allegiance to the Queen after the Reef War.

name: Her Revenge
flavor: Commissioned for those who would avenge the lost.

name: Hoss Mk.51
flavor: This weapon's true weight and heavy punch make for a valued friend when out beyond the City.

name: Ill Will
flavor: I am a particular genie, for a particular wish.

name: Imago Loop
flavor: …once-mighty wings, now dewy and fragile and new, as again the silken threads encased its...

name: Imprecation
flavor: A prototype from Tex Mechanica, sent along for calibration.

name: Jewel of Osiris
flavor: Its shimmering facets extend beyond sight or touch.

name: Jewel of Osiris (Adept)
flavor: An elite trophy earned only by Trials of Osiris champions.

name: Judith-D
flavor: Headshots are strongly encouraged with the powerful Häkke Judith-D.

name: Kaifeng-HC3
flavor: Winding rivers. Curving roofs. Ancient splendor. Find your way.

name: Kumakatok HC4
flavor: When the Omolon Kumakatok HC4 comes knocking, even the Darkness locks its doors.

name: LOCK_ARETE
flavor: Her excellence lies in swiftness.

name: Loner.Rebel
flavor: Won't be tied down.

name: Lord High Fixer
flavor: The Lord will hold court today.

name: Maverick Mk. 20
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. The Maverick is a balanced, flexible design with nice heft.

name: Maverick Mk. 32
flavor: Consistent and comfortable, the flexible Maverick Mk. 32 rewards the thoughtful shooter.

name: Merciful
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Merciless
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Mos Aria III
flavor: Reality is a chorus. One voice can change the song.

name: Mos Azoth IV
flavor: All matter is woven together in the same tapestry. Pull one thread and everything changes.

name: Mos Calamus I
flavor: All matter tends toward entropy. Your hand will speed it on its way.

name: Mos Ganon II
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. Lightweight composite and a small frame make the Ganon easy to handle.

name: Mos Ganon III
flavor: The Ganon points as easy as coming home. Some devilish cunning keeps the frame both strong and light.

name: Mos Ganon V
flavor: Heavier than the rest of the series, the intricate MGV is crammed with combat systems.

name: Mos Morsus III
flavor: Your bullets reach beyond the veil to strike enemies at their purest essence.

name: Mos Scala I
flavor: The subtle alignments of Light and power converge in your hand.

name: NIFTY_BISCUIT
flavor: Godfinger Eta-ACTIUM III Hand-Mounted Artillery (Inedible Type)

name: Omolon Test HC1
flavor: Omolon prototype. Make precision shots to gather data for Omolon's weapons developers.

name: Painted Big Chief Mk. 45
flavor: A powerful and effective Tex Mechanica hand cannon, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Painted Mos Ardus V
flavor: A compact Cassoid firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Peccadillo's Grace
flavor: A flexible Vanguard-issue hand cannon, its performance retuned by an Exo's Bayesian profiler.

name: Polite Denial 0/1
flavor: Thanks, but no thanks.

name: Primed Big Sky Mk. 48
flavor: A powerful Tex Mechanica firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Red Hand IX
flavor: Executor-issued personal firearm for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Regulator Mk. 56
flavor: Someone put a lot of care into the construction of this potent hand cannon.

name: Renegade Mk. 55
flavor: Rigged and ready for fine-tuning, the Renegade Mk.55 is an outlaw's weapon.

name: Rience-D
flavor: You will not suffer these invader kings to live.

name: Searcher Mk. 20
flavor: Hand cannons reward calm technique and sharp shooting. The high-caliber Searcher hits above its class.

name: Searcher Mk. 37
flavor: Massive rounds give the Searcher Mk.37 some real kick.

name: Silvered Maverick Mk. 41
flavor: A well-balanced Tex Mechanica hand cannon, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Sir Isaac
flavor: What comes up must go down.

name: Six Dreg Pride
flavor: Who needs four arms when it takes only one to draw, aim and squeeze?

name: Six Dreg Pride II
flavor: Who needs four arms when it takes only one to draw, aim and squeeze?

name: Stolen Pride
flavor: Aim, kill, repeat.

name: TFWPKY 1969
flavor: ...and if it doesn't, the bullets surely will.

name: The Chance
flavor: A personal firearm, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Devil You Don't
flavor: So many demons, it's hard to keep their names straight.

name: The Devil You Know
flavor: Let's make a deal…

name: The First Curse
flavor: "...is when death becomes an afterthought."

name: The Fulcrum
flavor: A personal firearm, augmented, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Last Word
flavor: "Yours…not mine." - Renegade Hunter Shin Malphur to Dredgen Yor

name: The Revelator
flavor: Repent! Repent!

name: The Vanity
flavor: A personal firearm, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Water Star
flavor: Here in this desert of glass and hardship, you will find true refreshment.

name: The Water Star (Adept)
flavor: Here in this desert of glass and hardship, you will find true refreshment.

name: Thorn
flavor: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." - 13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

name: Threnody HC4
flavor: Turn the funeral dirge into an aria of victory.

name: Timur's Lash
flavor: A personal firearm, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Uffern HC4
flavor: Omolon's Uffern HC4 sentences the City's enemies to burn.

name: Up the Ante
flavor: Until they fold, or you're dead.

name: Venation III
flavor: A personal firearm modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Vortimer-D
flavor: Where you come from is not important. It's for what you do that you will be remembered.

name: Word of Crota
flavor: There was life, and He spoke unto it; and it was silent, and lived no more.

name: Zaouli's Bane
flavor: Go, child! Run! Don't look back! Don't—"
